sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT L2_switch_type 
FROM dbo.vb_tbl_job a
JOIN dbo.vb_tbl_trigger b ON a.trigger_id = b.trigger_id
WHERE b.trigger_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.Trigger}'

SELECT DISTINCT L3_switch_type 
FROM dbo.vb_tbl_job a
JOIN dbo.vb_tbl_trigger b ON a.trigger_id = b.trigger_id
WHERE b.trigger_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.Trigger}'

SELECT DISTINCT L4_switch_type 
FROM dbo.vb_tbl_job a
JOIN dbo.vb_tbl_trigger b ON a.trigger_id = b.trigger_id
WHERE b.trigger_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.Trigger}'

properties.description: Loading Bulk Data from Raw Storage account to Source Account. -
Storing data into Source Storage account. Sink Side of Copy Activity
Linked Service used for Copy Activity of CSV Data from Raw Storage to Parquet format into Source Storage Account.
CSV Data from Raw Storage ADLS coming here into Source ADLS Storage account.
Raw Source Side of Excel File
Loading Data into Source Storage Account in a Parquet Format.
Raw Storage Side of JSON File
Source Side of JSON Converted into PARQUET Format
Source Side Storage account of REST API Storing Data  into PARQUET Format.
Raw Storage Linked Service for SFTP File
Data Loading into Source Storage Layer in a PARQUET Format - Sink Side of SFTP
